Name: Timmie
Title: "Pure Patience" Timmie
Desc: "Will pigeons that have flown away come back?"
Source: Reward for accepting Timmie's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Timmie
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Triggers automatically once per Round:</color> This card gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Pigeon</color>. When this card gains 3 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Pigeons</color>, discard this card, then draw 1 card and create $[K411] Ã—1.

K411.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>
K411.Desc: The {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
